videos.headline: C. Hackenberg pass,to D. Thompkins for 1 yd,D. Thompkins fumbled, forced by C. Fejedelem, recovered by Illin T. Barton

videos.headline: Hackenberg reverses roles, catches TD pass
videos.description: Christian Hackenberg pitches to Nick Scott, but the trick play is on as Scott passes to Hackenberg, who goes in for the 14-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Barkley soars through the air for TD
videos.description: Penn State's Saquon Barkley decides not to follow the laws of gravity in finding the end zone.

videos.headline: M. Allen run for 20 yds for a TD, (T. Davis KICK)
videos.description: Mark Allen run for 20 yds for a TD (Tyler Davis KICK)
